entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 6:21AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf Along The Coast Today Through Friday... Elevated surf and erosion is possible along the coast from the Colville River to Kaktovik today through Friday. Water levels 1 to 2 feet above normal high tides are expected today through Friday. Southwest winds will increase to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph today, and then turn west tonight and remain west into Friday.
